00005 int
00006 FILESERVICE::scan_integer(FILE *InputFile)
00007 {
00008     int integer;
00009     char FileLine[LENGTH];
00010     char *ptr;
00011     
00012     ptr=fgets(FileLine, LENGTH, InputFile);
00013 
00014     if(ptr==NULL)
00015     {
00016         fprintf(stderr, "Error in reading the control file.\n");
00017         exit(-1);
00018     }
00019     
00020     sscanf(FileLine,"%i", &integer);
00021     return(integer);
00022 }

00024 void
00025 FILESERVICE::scan_text(FILE *InputFile, char *text)
00026 {
00027     int i, length; 
00028     char FileLine[LENGTH];
00029     char *ptr;
00030 
00031     ptr=fgets(FileLine, LENGTH, InputFile);
00032 
00033     if(ptr==NULL)
00034     {
00035         fprintf(stderr, "Error in reading the control file.\n");
00036         exit(-1);
00037     }
00038     length=strlen(FileLine);
00039     for(i=0;i<length;i++)
00040     {
00041         if(FileLine[i]=='\0' || FileLine[i] == ' ' || FileLine[i] == '\n')
00042             break;
00043         
00044         text[i]=FileLine[i];
00045     }
00046     text[i]='\0';
00047 /*    sscanf(FileLine,"%s", text);*/
00048 }

00098 /* get a word from a string */
00099 
00100 int
00101 FILESERVICE::scan_word(int StartPosition, char *FileLine, char *text)
00102 {
00103     int i, EndPosition, length;
00104 
00105     length=strlen(FileLine);
00106 
00107     for(EndPosition=StartPosition,i=0;EndPosition<length;EndPosition++,i++)
00108     {
00109         if(FileLine[EndPosition]=='\0' || FileLine[EndPosition] == ' ' ||
00110            FileLine[EndPosition] == '\n')
00111             break;
00112         
00113         text[i]=FileLine[EndPosition];
00114     }
00115     text[i]='\0';
00116     
00117     return(EndPosition+1);
00118 }

00145 
00146 unsigned long bin_to_decimal(ivec& ptrShiftRegister, int NMinusK)
00147 {
00148         int i;
00149         unsigned long DecimalNotation,  multiplier;
00150         
00151         multiplier=1;
00152         DecimalNotation=0;
00153         
00154         for(i=NMinusK-1;i>=0;i--)
00155         {
00156                 DecimalNotation+=ptrShiftRegister[i]*multiplier;
00157                 multiplier=multiplier*2;
00158         }
00159 
00160         
00161         return(DecimalNotation);
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 
00166 void decimal_to_bin(ivec& ptrShiftRegister, unsigned long DecimalNotation, int NMinusK)
00167 {
00168             int i;
00169             int quot;
00170             int rem;
00171             
00172             quot=DecimalNotation;
00173             
00174             for(i=NMinusK-1;i>=0;i--)
00175             {
00176                     rem=quot%2;
00177                     quot=quot/2;
00178                     
00179                     ptrShiftRegister[i]=rem;
00180             }
00181 }
